tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    fraud_level INT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    activity_date DATE,
    fraud_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    fraud_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fraudsters (
    fraudster_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    fraudster_name VARCHAR(255),
    fraudster_email VARCHAR(255),
    fraudster_phone VARCHAR(20),
    fraudster_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT REFERENCES fraudulent_activities(activity_id),
    investigation_date DATE,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(255),
    investigation_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_description VARCHAR(255),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    location_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activity_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);
